title: Hot Springs National Park: Park Home
body: Hot springs in the middle of town?  Water. That's what first attracted people, and they have been coming here ever since to use these soothing thermal waters to heal and relax. Rich and poor alike came for the baths, and a thriving city built up around the hot springs. Together nicknamed "The American Spa," Hot Springs National Park today surrounds the north end of the city of Hot Springs, Arkansas. Come discover it for yourself. Read More             Thermal Pools of Hot Springs NP   These pools are 1 of 3 location where you can see and touch the 143 degree (F) thermal water.
